about_the_game:
Story:
-The story of a detective named Nguyen Trung Duc. and he gets entangled in a complicated case. Please help him solve the case. One evening, when the main character came home from work tired and he received a call to investigate the case of a female student committing suicide. His job is to clearly investigate the cause of the female student's death. The game is set in Hanoi, Vietnam in 2023
Developer & Designer:
-The game was programmed by a person named Nguyen Trung Duc
Gameplay:
-This is a simple puzzle game,l earn the plot, first person perspective game. Your goal is to simply find the designated red point in the area and the game will automatically run the plot.and fighting mechanism like (GHOSTWIRE: TOKYO) but the fighting mechanism is only available in the boss fight

content_descriptors.notes: the game has elements of shool violence

detailed_description:
Story:
-The story of a detective named Nguyen Trung Duc. and he gets entangled in a complicated case. Please help him solve the case. One evening, when the main character came home from work tired and he received a call to investigate the case of a female student committing suicide. His job is to clearly investigate the cause of the female student's death. The game is set in Hanoi, Vietnam in 2023
Developer & Designer:
-The game was programmed by a person named Nguyen Trung Duc
Gameplay:
-This is a simple puzzle game,l earn the plot, first person perspective game. Your goal is to simply find the designated red point in the area and the game will automatically run the plot.and fighting mechanism like (GHOSTWIRE: TOKYO) but the fighting mechanism is only available in the boss fight

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04
  • Processor: 2 GHz dual core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: m10
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS:
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
